Package ohos.agp.components

Interface Component.EditEventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Component

    public static interface Component.EditEventListener
    Provides listeners to process editing events triggered by keyboard shortcuts when they are distributed to components. The default implementation is subject to the internal implementation of each component.
    Since:
    7

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean onCopy​()
      Processes the Copy event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onCut​()
      Processes the Cut event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onDelete​()
      Processes the Delete event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onForwardDelete​()
      Processes the Forward Delete event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onPaste​()
      Processes the Paste event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onSelectAll​()
      Processes the Select All event distributed to this component.
      default boolean onUndo​()
      Processes the Undo event distributed to this component.

    • Method Detail

      • onCopy

        default boolean onCopy​()
        Processes the Copy event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Ctrl+C key combination.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Copy event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onPaste

        default boolean onPaste​()
        Processes the Paste event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Ctrl+V key combination.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Paste event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onCut

        default boolean onCut​()
        Processes the Cut event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Ctrl+X key combination.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Cut event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onUndo

        default boolean onUndo​()
        Processes the Undo event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Ctrl+Z key combination.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Undo event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onSelectAll

        default boolean onSelectAll​()
        Processes the Select All event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Ctrl+A key combination.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Select All event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onDelete

        default boolean onDelete​()
        Processes the Delete event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the BackSpace key.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Delete event is processed; returns false otherwise.

      • onForwardDelete

        default boolean onForwardDelete​()
        Processes the Forward Delete event distributed to this component. This API is bound to the Delete key.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Forward Delete event is processed; returns false otherwise.
